MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut affecting the WA4 postcode area of Warrington. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 11:37pm. Our team has managed to restore power to a number of properties in the area and are still working to connect the remaining customers to generators. We now expect all power to be back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 9am. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 5:15am on 17th January
